ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 39th charm song
ygData.msgSnippet: i do the same thing. as far as what is different, it has a MR debuff which makes it easier to resist, and useless to us unless what people say is true about it
ygData.messageBody:
i do the same thing.

as far as what is different, it has a MR debuff which makes it easier to
resist, and useless to us unless what people say is true about it helping
the charm last longer. and it's level cap is 52 instead of the lower cap on
the first charm song.

Shada

> Usually the first thing I ever do when I charm something is
> give it a /pet
> back off command to reset it's aggro list. Not only does /pet
> attack work
> every time after you do a /pet back off (well it does for
> me), it will keep
> your pet from attacking your party members, which I have seen
> numerous
> times.
>
> Sartori{Legion}
> Veeshan
